root.name: I Love Horses
root.description: I Love Horses is a minigame collection for the Nintendo DS that features around 20 different horse related minigames, most of which make use of the DS touchscreen.Â The game was originally intended to appeal to a younger audience, particularly one that loved horses. In an interview with the developer, however, it was revealed that I Love Horses is an intense horse-loving sim, one that will cater to only the most hardcore horse lovers out there.
